path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/CyberCity - Auction Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Uncheck transfer
findings.description: The return value of an external transfer/transferFrom call is not checked since the external tokens do not revert in case of failure and return false.

findings.title: Lack of event emissions
findings.description: The missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain liquidity fee changes.

findings.title: Missing check for comissionPercent
findings.description: While calculating the transaction fee, there is no check for the comissionPercent that could be

findings.title: Lack of Zero address validation
findings.description: The contract does not validate against zero addresses, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Typos
findings.description: Fixing typos in variable names to maintain code quality and readability.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: The function can potentially be declared as external to reduce gas costs.

findings.title: Unused variables/code
findings.description: Removing unused variables/code from the codebase to avoid increase in computations, indication of bugs or malformed data structures, and poor code quality.

findings.title: Typo: comissionPercent should be commissionPercent
findings.description: A typo exists in the codebase where 'comissionPercent' should be replaced with 'commissionPercent'.

findings.title: Typo: comissionWallet should be commissionWallet
findings.description: A typo was found in the variable name 'comissionWallet', it should be renamed to 'commissionWallet' for consistency and accuracy.
